title: The Mask of Midnight: A Gabriel McRay Novel
description: Troubled homicide detective Gabriel McRay confronts his nemesis Victor Archwood at the killer's Los Angeles trial. A surprise twist during the legal proceedings sets a course for Archwood to claim his ultimate revenge on the detective. In a trap that combines Archwood's theatrical skills and criminal genius, Gabriel is forced to face his psychological demons once again and play a deadly cat and mouse game with a murderous opponent who will stop at nothing to achieve the detective's total destruction. As reviewers say of this Clue Award-winner, "Victor Archwood is one of the best villains Iâ€™ve ever seen written," and "Victor Archwood reminded me of Hannibal Lecter." From another reviewer, "The Mask of Midnight is nothing short of astounding. A psychological thriller of the first caliber, I had to remind myself on more than one occasion to breathe."
author: Laurie Stevens
